taxonomy.Implemented: Native Rust code owns the entire operation. No host libc dependency. Full test coverage required.
taxonomy.RawSyscall: ABI entrypoint marshals arguments directly to Linux syscall instruction. No glibc call-through.
taxonomy.GlibcCallThrough: Delegates to host glibc after membrane pre/post validation. Requires host libc at runtime.
taxonomy.Stub: Deterministic failure contract. Returns stable errno/error code. Documented in support policy.

perf_classes.strict_hotpath: Called >= 1M/sec in typical workloads. Must meet <20ns strict budget.
perf_classes.hardened_hotpath: Called >= 1M/sec in hardened mode. Must meet <200ns hardened budget.

taxonomy.default_policy: Any exported symbol absent from explicit classification defaults to Stub and causes drift failure (exit 3).

mode_contract.strict: POSIX-correct error semantics. Membrane validates but never silently rewrites. ABI-compatible.
mode_contract.hardened: TSM repair enabled. Membrane applies deterministic healing (clamp, truncate, safe-default). Logs HealingAction.

artifact_applicability.rule: Implemented+RawSyscall apply to both artifacts; GlibcCallThrough+Stub are Interpose-only.
